435
The Problem of Abortion
After the class of actions is picked out, we need to determine what is be-
ing asked about this class of actions—what kind of moral judgment is at
stake. It is one thing to ask whether abortion is morally wrong, and another
thing to ask whether abortion should be illegal. These are both moral ques-
tions (because the second asks what the law should be and not what i
